text: int main ( ) { int n , nor , i , j , ar [ 20 ] [ 20 ] , r , c , rows ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; if ( n <= 1000 ) { while ( n -- > 0 ) { scanf ( "%d" , & rows ) ; nor = rows ; if ( nor >= 1 && nor <= 100 ) { for ( i = 0 ; i < nor ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & ar [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } r = rows - 2 ; while ( r >= 0 ) { c = 0 ; while ( c <= r ) { ar [ r ] [ c ] += ( ar [ r + 1 ] [ c ] > ar [ r + 1 ] [ c + 1 ] ? ar [ r + 1 ] [ c ] : ar [ r + 1 ] [ c + 1 ] ) ; c ++ ; } r -- ; } printf ( "%d\n" , ar [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } } return 0 ; }
